word_mean: 饱和剂量：放射治疗时，在短时间内先给予组织能耐受的最大剂量，然后在一段时间内分次给予较小剂量以维持生物效应
泡腾顿服量或泡腾饮剂
指物体颜色的包含量或纯度。
曾用名“［色］饱和度”。 色度学的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: AE中英文对照 ... Hue → 色相位 Saturation → 饱和度 Color → 颜色.
* 全屏抗锯齿(full-screen anti-aliasing(FSAA))* 颜色纠正(color correction)以及各种滤镜(color-shift)特效，包括跳跃漂白(bleach bypass)，过饱和(saturation)，去饱和(de-saturation).对一个游戏引擎来说，拥有一个特效系统来按理所有的粒子，贴花，还有其它特效的特殊渲染是常见的。粒子和贴.
彩度（Saturation）则是指色彩的纯度，也可以称为色彩的饱和度。第2节RGB 与 CMYK  色光叁原色 (R.G.B) 萤幕显示的色彩是由 RG…
卡尔斯坦的早期调查是与登博的实验结果完全一致的。她的问题并非调查情绪本身，而是情绪的饱和状态（saturation），也就是说，同一个任务重复次数的增加会在某些条件下引起有力的力量，这些力量阻止工作的继续，并最终中止.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from late Latin saturatio(n-), from Latin saturare 'fill, glut' (see saturate)

entry.def: Saturation is the process or state that occurs when a place or thing is filled completely with people or things, so that no more can be added.

example.ex: Reforms have led to the saturation of the market with goods...
example.tran: 改革已经使得市场上商品饱和。

example.ex: Road traffic has reached saturation point.
example.tran: 公路交通已达到饱和点。

entry.def: Saturation is used to describe a campaign or other activity that is carried out very thoroughly, so that nothing is missed.

example.ex: The concept of saturation marketing makes perfect sense...
example.tran: 饱和营销的概念是完全有道理的。

example.ex: Newspapers, television and radio are all providing saturation coverage.
example.tran: 报纸、电视和电台全都在铺天盖地地报道。

means.word_mean: 1. the process of totally saturating something with a substance;
2. the act of soaking thoroughly with a liquid
3. a condition in which a quantity no longer responds to some external influence
4. chromatic purity: freedom from dilution with white and hence vividness of hue

stems_affixes.value_cn: 渗透的, 饱和的, 深颜色的
stems_affixes.word_buile: saturate使充满,使饱和+ed……的→adj.渗透的, 饱和的, 深颜色的
saturate使充满,使饱和+ion表名词→n.饱和[状态];浸透

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使湿透,浸透;使充满,使饱和
stems_affixes.word_buile: satur足够,饱足+ate使……→使足够→饱和

sentences.en: television’s saturation coverage of the World Cup
sentences.cn: 电视对世界杯赛的饱和报道

sentences.en: The company’s sales are now close to saturation in many western countries.
sentences.cn: 这家公司的产品销售量在许多西方国家已接近饱和。

sentences.en: Demand for the product has reached saturation point.
sentences.cn: 对这一产品的需求已达到饱和点。

sentences.en: The refugee camps have reached saturation point.
